snippet: Across from South Street Seaport, the vintner Marco Pasanella has gotten his shop up and running for the holidays, but his neighborhood was emptied by Hurricane Sandy.
abstract: Vintner Marco Pasanella has gotten his wine shop across from South Street Seaport up and running for the holidays, but his neighborhood was emptied by Hurricane Sandy.
lead_paragraph: Across from South Street Seaport, the vintner Marco Pasanella has gotten his shop up and running for the holidays, but his neighborhood was emptied by Hurricane Sandy.

headline.seo: The Vintner Marco Pasanella Restarts After Hurricane Sandy
headline.main: Fighting the Calm After the Storm
headline.print_headline: Fighting the Calm After the Storm
